select pd.idpersonaldependiente, pd.uniNeg as uniNegP, pd.idPersonal, pd.nombre, pd.apepat, pd.apemat, pd.fecnac, pd.sexo, pd.idtipoestadocivil, pd.idtipodocper, pd.nrodoc, pd.idtipoparentesco, co.codigo as nombreParentesco, pd.idnacionalidad, pd.idcarrera, pd.idgradoacademico, pd.centrolaboral, pd.cargo, pd.area, pd.especialidad, pd.telefono, pd.creaPor, pd.creaFecha, pd.flgvive ,CAR.idCarrera as idCAR ,CAR.carrera as nombreCarrera , car.idCarreraSubArea
,csa.idCarreraSubArea as idCSA ,csa.subArea as nombreSA ,csa.idCarreraArea
,ca.idCarreraArea as idCA ,ca.idGradoAcademico
, ca.area as nombreArea
,GA.idGradoAcademico as idGA ,GA.nombre as nombreGA ,ga.idNivelAcademico
,na.idNivelAcademico as idNA ,na.nombre as nomNA ,na.idTipoFormacion
,tf.idTipoFormacion as idTF ,tf.nombre as nomTF ,pe.idPersonal as idPer ,pd.nombrecarrera as nombreCarrera ,pd.flgasignacionfamiliar as flgAsignacionFamiliar ,pd.flgbecas as flgBecas
from MO_PersonalDependiente pd INNER JOIN MO_Personal PE on pd.idPersonal = PE.idPersonal and pe.unineg=pd.unineg LEFT JOIN MO_Carrera CAR on pd.idCarrera=CAR.idCarrera LEFT Join MO_CarreraSubArea csa ON csa.idCarreraSubArea=CAR.idCarreraSubArea LEFT Join MO_CarreraArea ca ON ca.idCarreraArea=csa.idCarreraArea
LEFT Join MX_GradoAcademico GA on pd.idGradoAcademico=GA.idGradoAcademico LEFT join MX_NivelAcademico NA on ga.idNivelAcademico=na.idNivelAcademico LEFT join MX_TipoFormacion TF on tf.idTipoFormacion =na.idTipoFormacion
Inner Join MO_Codigo co on co.idcodigo = pd.idtipoparentesco

SELECT CONCAT(UPPER(ISNULL(PD.apepat,'')),' ',UPPER(ISNULL(pd.apemat,'')),', ',UPPER(ISNULL(pd.nombre,''))) as nombreDependiente,
ISNULL(tipPar.codigo,'') as parentesco, concat((case when cod.codigo='Carnet de Extranjeria' then 'C.E.' when cod.codigo='Pasaporte' then 'PAS.' else ((case when pd.nrodoc is not null and pd.nrodoc!='' then isnull(cod.codigo,'')+': ' end)) end) ,isnull(pD.nrodoc,'')) as nroDoc, pd.telefono, (case when pd.fecnac is null then ' / / ' else (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), pd.fecnac, 103)) end) as fecNac, (case when pd.fecnac is null then '' else floor((cast(convert(varchar(8),getdate(),112) as int)-cast(convert(varchar(8),pd.fecnac,112) as int) ) / 10000) end) as edad FROM MO_PersonalDependiente PD left join MO_Codigo tipPar on tipPar.idcodigo=pd.idtipoparentesco left join MO_Codigo cod on cod.idcodigo=pd.idtipodocper where pd.idpersonal=#{idPersonal} and pd.unineg=#{uniNeg}
